articles.author: Jones Hayden
articles.title: Ukraine's Zelenskyy says 'counteroffensive and defensive actions' under way against Russia - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Ukrainian president appears to confirm long-awaited counteroffensive but declines to give details.
articles.content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy on Saturday appeared to confirm that his country’s much-anticipated counteroffensive against Russia’s invasion has begun, but he said Ukraine would refrain fro… [+2531 chars]
